title: Did they buff Rumble or something in the past 8 months?
body: Holy crap, he's so goddamn strong. I've played him for the first time in a year and I love him again.

replies.body:
Yeah, hes REALLY good top lane again. Q does 100% damage to minions, makes split pushing sooo much better

And hes also Godlike in the jungle with his good clears, the lane ganks with his R are crazy. Run in, Ult in a line. Force enemy adc/sup to flash over the Ult. 

{{champion:68}}  If i wasnt a adc main, rumble is who I would pick everytime.
